title: Create a Single Player Submission
custom_steps:
Login as a domestic Club
Enter First, Last names, DOB, and School in the create new widget
Click Next
Fill in all required fields, click Save
custom_expected:
Profile is saved
Player has a status of Pending Eligible for current draft year
Player shows in the club interest list widget as Submitted and Pending Eligible with origin of submitting(Club)

title: Upload a Consent
custom_steps:
Login as domestic club
Scroll down to selectable players widget
From the widget look for desired play, if said player requires consent click on "upload" button under "Consent Required" column.
Choose file to upload (Must be word document or PDF)
Click upload
custom_expected: Consent form is successfully uploaded and pending approval.

title: Multiple Player Submission (Spreadsheet Upload)
custom_steps:
Login as domestic club
Scroll down to "Club Interest List" widget
Click upload list on the bottom right of the widget
Click choose file and click the desired spreadsheet
Click upload
custom_expected:
User will receive a pop up notifying of successful submission.
Uploaded spreadsheet will appear in the clubs notification widget and can be downloaded with a results column added.
Players who have a 'successfully submitted' status can be found in the Club Interest List with a status of Pending Eligible.

title: Resubmit Player for Draft via Create New
custom_steps:
Login as club ARI
Via advanced search, find a passed over ARI player from within the last 5 years
Note his information ( First name, Last name, DOB and school)
Enter the same info in the create new widget ( hard match)
Click Next
*popup will appear asking you to resubmit player for draft, click resubmit button
Players profile will open filled in with all previous info
Click Save
custom_expected:
Player is saved
When viewing the player history, it will have a current year draft record
Player appears in clubs interest list widget as pending eligible for current year

title: Club can 'select' which profile to keep in case of close match
custom_preconds: If you club interest list does not have any players with Potential Matches, you will need to upload a spreadsheet containing soft matches to existing players on that clubs list.
custom_steps:
Go to "Club Interest List"
Find your player
Look under "Submission Status" column
Click the Potential Matches drop down
System will show the potential match(es)
Click Select (Next to the profile of the closely matching player)
custom_expected: User receives a pop up message notifying that the submitted player has been replaced by selected player.

title: Club can 'override' potential matches
custom_steps:
Login as Domestic Club
Navigate to "Club Interest List"
Upload a spreadsheet with soft or hard matching players
Once uploaded, find those players on Club Interest List widget
Look under "Submission Status" column
Click the Potential Matches drop down
System will show the potential match(es)
Click Ignore/Override
custom_expected: Potential matches warning disppears, and both players show as submitted successffuly and pending eligible.

title: Merging Profiles
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Scroll down to Domestic Amateur Players widget
Under The Warning column, click the percentage drop down to see the matching profiles
Check the boxes of the matching player(s)
Click Merge
Then Click Merge again when you receive the pop up with the players information
Override warning
custom_expected: The two players will successfully be merged into one player with one unique player ID. The player who was entered earlier is the one whose Player ID is retained. The discarded player is no longer available in the DAPM Widget.

title: BOC "Ignores" a Potential Match
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Scroll down to Domestic Amateur Players widget
Under The Warning column, click the percentage drop down to see the matching profiles
On a player with a warning percentage, click the "+" next to the percentage
This will show the matching profiles
Select the matching profiles
Click Ignore

title: Update Player's Rule 4 Status via Domestic Amateur widget
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
At the DAPM widget, click the box of the desired player
At the bottom of the widget click the R4 status drop down box
Select the desired status update.
custom_expected:
The players R4 status will become saved and updated.
After saving, go onto the players profile and ensure that the R4 status at the top of the page is changed and updated.

title: Update Player's Rule 4 Status via Player Profile
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
From the DAPM widget, choose a player for the current year who is pending eligible
Click Edit at the bottom of the page.
Click the Rule 4 Status drop down and select "Eligible"
Click Save.
custom_expected:
The players R4 status will become saved and updated.
The Player will show as Eligible in the DAPM Widget
The Player will also now get a Player ID.

title: Approve a Submitted Consent Form
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Scroll down to "Consent Form Tracking" widget
Check the box of the desired pending player
Click approve
custom_expected: User receives a pop up notifying of "Approval success"

title: Submit a player on behalf of a club
custom_steps:
Login as BOC
Fill in required fields on create new widget (first name, last name, DOB, School)
Submit on behalf of a club
Click Next
Fill in all required fields on the profile
Click Save
custom_expected:
BOC is able to submit the player on behalf of a club and MLSB.
Player appears on the clubs interest list with a status of Pending Eligible
Player appears on the DAPM widget for BOC as Pending Eligible submitted by signed on Club
